      • getOutCoordinates

        public static double[] getOutCoordinates(LocationList list)
        Calculates the outer coordinates of the locationlist. The coordinates are returned in an array in the order: north, east, south, west
        Parameters:
        list - - locationlist.
        Returns:
        double array containing outer coordinates {north, east, south, west}.

      • distanceToFormat

        public static java.lang.String distanceToFormat(float distance)
        Converts the distance to a format. If the length is smaller than 1 km the distance is displayed in meter. Otherwise in km.
        Parameters:
        distance - - in m.
        Returns:
        formatted distance.
